text:
Greetings,

Currently seeking a healthy influx of testers to give honest feedback about a home/interior design app I'm currently helping develop.

Please see the opt-in link below. Feel free to post feedback in this post, or shoot it to my inbox. If there's any issues in acquiring the app, let me know.

https://play.google.com/apps/testing/uk.co.homesmatch.app

Thanks.
title: Show HN: Home and Interior Design App â€“ Seeking Testers
